entry.title: Dense Fog Advisory issued September 09 at 8:31AM AKDT until September 09 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT TODAY NEAR GLENNALLEN... * WHAT...Visibility to a quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Glennallen and low lying areas along the Copper River. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.

entry.title: Heat Advisory issued September 09 at 10:32AM AST until September 09 at 5:00PM AST by NWS
entry.summary: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heat indices values of 108 to 111 degrees Fahrenheit. * WHERE...The urban and low lying areas along the northern coast from Aguadilla to Fajardo, eastern interior, Vieques, Culebra, and St. Croix. * WHEN...Thru 5 PM AST this afternoon.

entry.title: High Surf Advisory issued September 09 at 10:31AM AST until September 11 at 8:00PM AST by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 PM AST MONDAY... * WHAT...Life-threatening rip currents due to breaking waves of 6 and 10 feet, and occasionally higher. * WHERE...Beaches along St Croix Eastern Half.
